This game has potential but the killers are too overpowered. If you like to play as a survivor you will be very disappointed. To put it in perspective, I have my survivors basically maxed out and it is rare to get an escape straight up, I played a few times as a killer with nothing unlocked for them, less than level 10 and killed everybody almost every time. It is just too unbalanced. and has been since I've had the game downloaded.
they ruined the game. Devs dont care abt it.

One of my favorite games of all time. The recent patch finally made it so that killers had even ground with survivors, and removed a lot of second chance perks on both sides. It changed the meta around after 6 years and it was definitely needed. It's a lot of fun to play, just remember that this is just a game because sometimes this community takes this game way too seriously.

CAN be good with friends, otherwise no. you want game play, and a community thats AS toxic as league of legends? Well boy, do i have a game for you! in this game, its a team of 4 survivors VS a single killer, naturally in this situation the killer would have to be "overpowered". Which is fine, as most games like that usually do. however, there is mechanics of the game, that simply allow the killer to not allow you to play. imagine this, you start the game, the killer has a perk to immediantly find you {lethal pursuer} chases you down, and puts you on the hook. This killer then sits there and waits for you to die, if any of your friends come to rescue you, the killer waits, hits you, then again slaps you on the hook. repeat until your dead. 

one could argue that the killer is wasting time and your team will win, sure that CAN HAPPEN, assuming your team is actually smart enough to continue the objective. if your solo quing? its unlikely they are. as ive experienced over and over again. even if so, what about you? you who just wanted to play a videogame and enjoy yourself? nah. you will sit there until you're dead. sound fun yet? this happens so often you wouldent believe. look at my hours, im not just some salty newbie. ive played since the beginning, this has never gotten better and the devs have done nothing to curb this behavior.

thats not to say you cant find fun in this game. on very rare occurences or youre playing with a full squad of friends, it CAN be fun. but the amount of effort it takes to do that can leave this game to be lesser than something out there thats better to contribute your friends time to.
3/10 would recommend

Receta arroz con pollo

Instrucciones
1
Coloca el aceite en una olla grande a fuego bajo. Sofríe los tres pimentones picados, el ajo y la cebolla cabezona y revuelve hasta que tomen un color doradito.
2
Agrega las 3 tazas de arroz, lo importante es revolver muy bien.
3
Añade las 5 tazas de agua, las verduras en trocitos, las pechugas de pollo, el cubo de caldo de pollo, el sobre de sazón y la sal al gusto. Revuelve y deja cocinar a fuego medio por aproximadamente 15 minutos o hasta que se seque el arroz.
4
Una vez que el arroz haya absorbido toda el agua tapa la olla y cocina a fuego bajo por 10 a 15 minutos más hasta que el arroz esté suave.

I wouldn't recommend this game to people who want something fair. I used to do well as surv, but with this new update, it guarantees you will never win as surv. No speed boost on hit, 0 hit cooldown for killer, and nerfed survivor perks are now the reason I am uninstalling. You used to be able to combat the killer with tactical perks if you played very well, you cannot do any of that now, even if you play well. My entire swf cannot win a single match, and from my experience, the killers we face are very bad. I would have did well, had it not been for the extremely killer sided update.. Goodbye, dbd..

I have played this game for 1230 Hours, and most likely 1k hours Survivor. Before the latest patch the game was quite unfair for Killers, but a good Killer could still manage to get some Kills. After the new patch the game became completely unbalanced. The Perk changes changed the whole Meta for survivors, which is great. You wont find a perfect Perkcombo to run, you will need to play what sticks with you. The only Problem is the decreased repair speed they put on the Generators. You cant really get generators done as a survivor, escpecially if the Killers are running their Metaperks. The Meta for Killers currently is based on regression Perks against the Generators. This would also be completely fine, if they didnt decrease the repair speed. Currently the game became Killersided, but not because they changed the Perks definetly because of the repair speed. And before someone starts crying that "high" ranks dont have problems. Ive been R1 every time ive been playing the game. Im really sure that recovering the repair speed would fix this situation.

玩了1760小时了，从一开始不敢动到现在追着屠夫皮，经历了好几年，核心玩法永远不变，喜欢的自然一直喜欢，不喜欢的玩几个小时就退坑了，我玩这么久说明这的确是很吸引我。
画质是我可以接受的，建模我认为还挺不错的，除了屠夫妮娅。每个人物的形象都有各自的特色。既然是恐怖游戏，那屠夫也自然是千奇百怪的，一开始很害怕小白脸，后来玩多了也不怕了，直到零妹的出现，再到现在这个柜屠夫）名字忘了
因为游戏玩法其实很简单，我就不提了，比较喜欢的角色是凤敏，双马尾，凯特。每次出新衣服，戳到自己就必须买，社区评论区的氛围几乎都是：黎明杀机天下第一   这样子的评论。总的来说，推荐没玩过此类游戏的可以试试，个人认为要比第五人格高一个档次
